## Valid Wizard Step Values

Use these values in the `wizard_steps` frontmatter field:

| Step | ID | Description |
|:-----|:---|:------------|
| 1 | `fund-basics` | FUND BASICS |
| 2 | `investment-rounds` | INVESTMENT ROUNDS |
| 3 | `capital-structure` | CAPITAL ALLOCATION |
| 4 | `investment-strategy` | INVESTMENT STRATEGY |
| 5 | `distributions` | EXIT RECYCLING |
| 6 | `cashflow-management` | WATERFALL & CARRY |
| 7 | `review` | ADVANCED SETTINGS |
| 8 | `complete` | REVIEW & CREATE |
